definition: to add water (or other liquid) to (another ingredient such as powdered milk or tea leaves)/to infuse (tea)
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: I mix it with hot water like tea.
sentences.chinese: 用熱水沖泡，喝起來像茶。

sentences.english: The water should be actually boiling at the moment of impact, which means that one should keep it on the flame while one pours.
sentences.chinese: 沖泡應該用沸水，這意味着倒水時應該讓火燃着。

sentences.english: The tea has orchid aroma and tastes mellow and thick.
sentences.chinese: 沖泡後，有天然的蘭花香，滋味純濃。

sentences.english: Use spring or filtered water when cold brewing iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 用彈簧或過濾水沖泡時冷冰茶。

sentences.english: Make Thai tea by pouring sweetened milk into strongly brewed black tea over ice.
sentences.chinese: 請通過注入強烈沖泡冰紅茶在泰國甜牛奶茶。

sentences.english: Learn how to brew black tea in this free video about brewing loose leaf tea.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在此免費視頻沖泡約沖泡散葉茶紅茶。

sentences.english: Learn how to brew black tea in this free video about brewing loose leaf tea.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在此免費視頻沖泡約沖泡散葉茶紅茶。

sentences.english: When it comes to great flavor, coffee chemistry boils down to roasting and brewing.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡化學將咖啡的濃郁風味歸功於烘焙和沖泡。

sentences.english: Wuyi rock tea brewing, having a unique style.
sentences.chinese: 武夷巖茶的沖泡，別具一格。

sentences.english: Sixthly, one should take the teapot to the kettle and not the other way about.
sentences.chinese: 第六，該把茶壺拿到燒水壺處沖泡而非相反。

sentences.english: First, you must guarantee the use of water, tea, hot third.
sentences.chinese: 首先，必須嚴把用水，茶具，沖泡三道關。

sentences.english: Brewing flowered tea can take up to an hour for the best results.
sentences.chinese: 茶葉沖泡花最多可能需要最好的結果，一個小時。

sentences.english: Treatment of habitual constipation cassia seed 30 grams, boiling water, generation of tea drinking.
sentences.chinese: 治習慣性便祕決明子30克，開水沖泡，代茶飲用。

sentences.english: When it is brewed, the water appears green and bright, fresh and tender. The long-lasting flavor tastes mellow.
sentences.chinese: 沖泡時湯色碧綠明亮，嫩香高長，滋味醇厚。

sentences.english: Great Coffee Depends on Roasting and Brewing
sentences.chinese: 濃郁的咖啡取決於烘焙和沖泡的技術。

sentences.english: What is better than a cup of fresh hot coffee?
sentences.chinese: 有什麼能比得過一杯剛剛沖泡而成還冒着熱氣的咖啡？

definition: Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
to concentrate (a liquid)/concentration/espresso coffee/abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡
to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
